entry.title: To be with you in paradise
entry.summary:
Author: Sherlock_Spock

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,795Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 25

Summary: A merciless heatwave descends on Camelot, draining knights and servants alike, testing even Prince Arthur’s resolve. In the suffocating air, where every movement grows heavier and every glance lingers too long, the line between duty and desire begins to blur.Caught between the weight of the sun and the pull of something far more dangerous, Arthur and Merlin soon find that the fiercest heat may not come from the summer at all.

entry.title: That Which Cannot Die
entry.summary:
Author: IIALFAII

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,310Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 92

Summary: When Merlin is lost to Arthur in a way he cannot understand, the prince is left shattered—adrift in a world colder and lonelier than he ever imagined. But grief is only the beginning. When Merlin returns, changed and without memory of being gone, or why, Arthur confronts a truth he never expected: Merlin is his soulmate, the missing piece that makes him whole. As their bond rekindles and deepens, Arthur will fight against all odds to protect the man he cannot live without. Together, they must navigate secrets, danger, and their own hearts—discovering that love can rise from even the darkest of tragedies, and that some souls are destined to be forever entwined.

entry.title: Rivalry & Redemption
entry.summary:
Author: fandomsinabluebox1998

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,205Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 493

Summary: Merlin Emrys, a Slytherin 6th year at Hogwarts, is looking forward to a successful term. He has his best friend Gwen, the respect of professors and students, and a spot on the Slytherin Quidditch team as a talented Chaser.There's only one problem - Arthur Pendragon.Best friends when they were young, Merlin and Arthur now battle in a fierce rivalry, both on and off the Quidditch pitch. After an accident, however, the two Hogwarts students slowly start to rekindle their friendship, only for it to lead to much more.Relationships are tested, emotions rise, and secrets of the past are revealed.

entry.title: Professor Emrys
entry.summary:
Author: Sophthenerd

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,445Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 276

Summary: What if Merlin was best friends with the Marauders but left for an internship just after school ended. What happens when he returns years later and learns what happened to his friends while he was gone.This is my first fic so it might be a little choppy. For some context all 5 seasons of Merlin are canon in this and this takes place while Merlin is waiting for Arthur to rise from the lake of Avalon. Books one and two of Harry Potter are the same and the story starts off just before book three.

entry.title: When Gold Glows All is Known
entry.summary:
Author: Mushroomfroggies

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,297Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 26

Summary: The arrow shoots right towards Merlin spooking his horse. The horse kicks up throwing Merlin off.He hits the ground hard and as dust swirls around him he hears Arthur scream "MERLIN". He lifts his head to see Arthur staring at him concern written all over his face. He's just about to tell Arthur he's okay when a bandit comes up behind Arthur."WATCH OUT" Merlin yells as the bandit raises his sword. The Knights turn but there is no time for them to reach Arthur. Merlin reaches out his hand, his eyes glow gold, he mutters a spell and the bandits drop dead. I've separated this fic into 2 chapters so you can avoided the trigger warnings if you need to. 1st chapter is trigger free. Trigger warnings listed in author's note of ch 2

entry.title: A love time stands still for
entry.summary:
Author: hysterical_light

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,735Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: What if no one is around when Arthur rises from the lake,what if Arthur is left to make his own way, towards the warm feeling guiding his soul.With a knights mindset in the modern world.A fairly sappy warm take on Arthur rising and finding Merlins new life in his little tudor house with his big grey cat
